name: AG William Tong

tweet: Today, I will hold my loved ones closer and say a prayer for the families who don‚Äôt have that chance anymore.

name: AG William Tong
tweet: The heartbreak of that day has never dulled and I have not forgotten the victims. We honor them today with love, kindness and by committing to commonsense reforms that will ensure no more innocent lives are claimed and no family has to grieve losing a loved one to gun violence.

name: AG William Tong
tweet: Today marks 8 years since the senseless loss of 26 beautiful souls at Sandy Hook Elementary School. I was at a meeting in Stamford, and remember the utter confusion and disbelief the people in that meeting shared as we watched the news unfold on TV.

name: AG William Tong
tweet: As Attorney General and a lawyer, I know that this case should never have happened. This lawsuit was a grave breach of our covenant with each other and the compact among the states.   What must we do to make sure it is never repeated or forgotten?

name: AG William Tong
tweet: The court saw this suit for what it was‚Äîa shameful legal coup with zero basis in fact or law.   It is now time for all to accept the results of this free and fair election and to fully embrace the transfer of power.   Enough.

name: AG William Tong
tweet: SCOTUS slaps down seditious TX suit. The rule of law continues to reign in America.

name: AG William Tong
tweet: I call on my colleagues to put country over party, to abandon this suit, and let us all get back to our real work now.

name: AG William Tong
tweet: This suit will fail because it is a fact-free disgrace to the judicial system. But before it fails, it will cause immense, lasting harm to the legal profession and the community of AGs who have a powerful bipartisan record fighting together to protect & defend American families.

name: AG William Tong
tweet: This is nothing less than an attempted legal coup that risks the destruction of the union.   SCOTUS must reject this reckless hack job and put to rest the lies & nonsense.

name: AG William Tong
tweet: I just joined 23 of my colleagues urging SCOTUS to reject TX's effort to invalidate the election.   The American people cast their ballots in a free and fair election.
